aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: We're building the AI Intake Engineer for bug reports.
aboutUs.intro1: We are Elina, Ehsan and Juan. After talking to 30+ B2B SaaS teams, we discovered a universal pain: engineers spend 30-120 minutes trying to reproduce each bug, burning €20,000-40,000 per month in productivity.
aboutUs.intro2: Existing tools capture screenshots. We capture reality. Our AI interviews users, captures the exact DOM state, and generates deterministic test scripts.
